title: Gallery Conversation: Revelations in the Work of Kara Walker and Nancy Spero
short_description: Join Giampaolo Bianconi, associate curator in Modern and Contemporary Art, in a discussion of newly installed works on paper by Kara Walker and Nancy Spero.
list_description: Join Giampaolo Bianconi, associate curator in Modern and Contemporary Art, in a discussion of newly installed works on paper by Kara Walker and Nancy Spero.
description:
Join Giampaolo Bianconi, associate curator in Modern and Contemporary Art, for a discussion of newly installed works on paper by Kara Walker and Nancy Spero. 

If you have any questions about programming, please reach out to museum-programs@artic.edu. For questions related to accessibility accommodations, please email access@artic.edu. 

Please note that in-person tours may be canceled or postponed due to unforeseen circumstances.
